subject: RE: A shipment from order #SSN3449 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

I just recieved my order, but it's not correct. 1 ordered 3 separate units but I got a 3 motor kit.

Met vriendelijke groet,
Niels Boer

conversations.body_text: Hi Niels Boer,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. After verification, it has been confirmed that our warehouse staff made an error in shipping. We can either issue a refund for the undelivered items or arrange for a replacement shipment.

Hi,

No problem! I would like to have the missing parts shipped.

I'm missing,

2x power adapter
2x plus x control box.

Met vriendelijke groet,
Niels Boer


-------- Oorspronkelijk bericht --------
Hi Niels Boer,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047084418478
